info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN BORDEN AND CENTRAL DAWSON COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamesa Municipal Airport, or near Lamesa, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Los Ybanez, Tenmile, Arvana, Hancock and Key. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
